item.title: 电动汽车价格战持续，CATL 优先考虑海外扩张
item.description: 全球最大的电动汽车电池制造商当代安培瑞斯科技有限公司（Contemporary Amperex Technology Co.全球最大的电动汽车电池制造商安培瑞斯科技有限公司（Amperex Technology Co., Ltd.）首席制造官倪军称，由于中国国内汽车市场的激烈竞争威胁到该行业的健康发展，该公司正将海外扩张作为 "第一要务"。【原文：Contemporary Amperex Technology Co. Ltd., the world’s largest electric vehicle battery maker, is making overseas expansion its “No. 1 priority” as intense competition in China’s domestic car market threatens the industry’s health, according to Chief Manufacturing Officer Ni Jun.】

item.title: 英国大亨索特的家族办公室在全球紧张局势中寻求交易
item.description: 布赖恩-索特（Brian Souter）是世界上最大的运输业巨头之一，他的投资公司计划继续进行交易，即使在全球市场波动加剧的情况下，其他基金经理也会抑制风险投资。【原文：An investment firm for Brian Souter, who built one of the world’s biggest transport fortunes, plans to keep striking deals even as other money managers curb risk-taking amid heightened volatility in global markets.】

item.title: 尤文图斯俱乐部的加密货币投资者已转为激进分子，并希望获得董事会席位
item.description: 情人节当天，总部位于萨尔瓦多的加密货币公司 Tether 宣布成为意大利最杰出的足球俱乐部之一尤文图斯的投资者。四个月后，双方的关系并不顺利。【原文：On Valentine’s Day, El Salvador-based crypto firm Tether announced it has become an investor in Juventus, one of Italy’s most distinguished football clubs. Four months later, the relationship is not going well.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：英国股市将连续第二天落后于欧洲股市涨势
欧盟希望中国在七月峰会前解决稀土问题
item.description: 欧盟驻北京最高特使表示，欧盟希望中国在下个月的领导人会议之前解决目前稀土磁铁短缺的问题。【原文：The European Union wants China to resolve the current shortage of rare earth magnets before a meeting of their leaders next month, according to the bloc’s top envoy to Beijing.】

item.title: 卡塔尔关联私人银行将拓展贝莱德财富管理服务
item.description: 由卡塔尔统治家族成员控制的欧洲最大的纯银行之一，正在扩大与贝莱德公司（BlackRock Inc.【原文：One of Europe’s largest pure-play banks, which is controlled by members of Qatar’s ruling family, is expanding a partnership with BlackRock Inc. to bolster its investing services.】

item.title: 韩国投资者追捧亚洲最热门股票，保证金押注激增
item.description: 在公司治理改革乐观情绪的推动下，韩国母婴投资者正在提高杠杆率以追逐股票收益，这使得基准 Kospi 股指成为今年亚洲表现最好的股指。【原文：South Korean mom-and-pop investors are ramping up leverage to chase equity gains, driven by optimism surrounding corporate governance reform that’s made the benchmark Kospi stock index Asia’s best performer this year.】

item.title: 越南寻求与俄罗斯紧急会谈以加速核能发展
item.description: 越南正在寻求与俄罗斯进行紧急讨论，以努力加快其核计划，并指出该国在本十年结束前将反应堆投入运行的目标面临风险。【原文：Vietnam is seeking urgent discussions with Russia in an effort to accelerate its nuclear program, flagging risks to the country’s goal of having a reactor in operation by the end of the decade.】

item.title: 药明康德支持的 MegaRobo 据称计划在香港上市
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，MegaRobo 科技公司正计划最快于今年在香港进行首次公开募股，当时生物技术行业的股票正在飙升。【原文：MegaRobo Technologies Co. is planning a Hong Kong initial public offering as soon as this year, according to people familiar with the matter, amid a jump in stocks from the biotechnology sector.】

item.description:
无论特朗普在 7 月 8 日做什么，至少一些关税将继续存在。【原文：

Whatever Trump does on July 8, at least some tariffs are here to stay.

item.title: 波兰金融科技公司押注 Erste 入股以加速对外扩张
item.description: 波兰最成功的移动支付公司希望新股东埃尔斯特集团银行股份公司（Erste Group Bank AG）能加速其在东欧的扩张。【原文：Poland’s most successful mobile-payment company is hoping that new shareholder Erste Group Bank AG will accelerate its expansion in eastern Europe.】

item.title: 捷克央行将维持利率不变，并可能发出更长时间休整的信号
item.description: 捷克央行可能将再次停止降息，投资者正在等待有关前景的线索，这些线索可能预示着更长时间的暂停甚至货币宽松政策的结束。【原文：The Czech central bank will probably halt interest rate cuts again, with investors awaiting clues about the outlook that may signal a longer pause or even the end of monetary easing.】

item.title: 台湾限制华为出口后，中国大陆誓言采取 "强硬措施
item.description: 在台湾将包括华为技术有限公司在内的中国公司列入黑名单，限制其开发尖端人工智能的能力之后，北京誓言要对台湾的 "技术封锁 "做出回应。【原文：Beijing vowed to respond to Taiwan’s “technological blockades” after the self-ruled island blacklisted Chinese companies including Huawei Technologies Co., limiting their ability to develop cutting-edge artificial intelligence.】

item.title: 即将卸任的亚洲国际投资银行行长强调向全球合作伙伴开放
item.description: 亚洲基础设施投资银行即将离任的行长表示，亚洲基础设施投资银行仍对包括美国和日本在内的所有国家开放，这家总部设在北京的机构希望强调其日益扩大的全球影响力。【原文：The Asian Infrastructure Investment Bank remains open to all countries, including the US and Japan, the lender’s outgoing president said, as the Beijing-based institution looks to emphasize its growing global reach.】

item.title: 总理称中国正在建设 "超大型消费国
item.description: 李强总理表示，中国有信心将消费转化为经济的驱动力，同时也希望中国在迅速变化的全球贸易格局中成为一股稳定的力量。【原文：Premier Li Qiang has projected confidence that China can turn consumption into a driver for the economy, while also casting his nation as a stabilizing force in a rapidly shifting global trade landscape.】

item.title: 通胀加剧，最鹰派的日本央行委员标榜加息风险
item.description: 日本央行最鹰派的成员表示，如果通胀风险上升，即使经济不确定性持续存在，也可能有必要提高利率。【原文：The Bank of Japan’s most hawkish member said it may be necessary to raise interest rates should inflation risks rise even if economic uncertainty lingers.】

item.title: 中国国家主席习近平在开发银行发表讲话，对援助减少表示遗憾
item.description: 中国财政部部长蓝佛安在一个总部设在北京的多边贷款机构会议上发言时警告说，新兴国家用于跨境基础设施建设的资金正在短缺。【原文：China’s Finance Minister Lan Fo’an warned emerging countries are running short of money to spend on cross-border infrastructure, in remarks at a meeting of a multilateral lender based in Beijing.】

item.title: 印尼总统英德拉瓦蒂表示印尼有望保持适度预算赤字
item.description: 印尼财政部长预计，今年的预算赤字将占国内生产总值的 2.5%，与最初预计的一样，远低于法律规定的 3% 上限。【原文：Indonesia’s finance minister expects the budget deficit this year to come in at 2.5% of gross domestic product, as initially projected and well below the 3% ceiling mandated by law.】

item.title: 伊朗停战刺激需求，亚洲美元债券发行量猛增
item.description: 以色列和伊朗之间的停火提振了投资者的胃口，在日本的带动下，亚太地区的美元债券发行量攀升。【原文：Dollar bond issuance climbed in the Asia Pacific, led by Japan, after a ceasefire between Israel and Iran boosted investor appetite.】

item.title: 中国国有矿商加入 "淘金热 "筹集资金
item.description: 随着贵金属价格飙升至历史新高，贵金属前景看涨，中国黄金矿商纷纷涌向离岸资本市场融资。【原文：Chinese gold miners have been flocking to offshore capital markets to raise funds, fueled by the precious metal’s bullish outlook as prices soar to record highs.】

item.title: 投资者关注 HDB Financial 14 亿美元上市，印度 IPO 指标举步维艰
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: 美元疑云重重，中国抓住时机实现人民币全球化
item.description: 中国正在发起一场声势浩大的运动，以促进人民币在全球的作用，抓住官员们眼中难得的战略机遇。【原文：China is launching a sweeping campaign to promote the yuan’s global role, seizing what officials see as a rare strategic opening.】

item.title: 中国铜冶炼厂加大出口以摆脱对 LME 的挤压
item.description: 铜市场历史性的紧缩给中国的一些冶炼厂带来了压力，促使它们增加出口，以弥补在伦敦金属交易所的头寸。【原文：An historic squeeze in the copper market has put pressure on some Chinese smelters, prompting them to ramp up exports in a bid to cover their positions on the London Metal Exchange.】

item.title: 韩国央行警告宽松政策继续存在住房和债务风险
item.description: 房价的持续上涨，尤其是首尔大都市区的房价上涨，可能会加速韩国的债务积累，并对金融稳定构成风险，从而威胁到在长期政治动荡和美国关税面前总体表现良好的金融体系。【原文：Persistent housing price gains, particularly in the Seoul metropolitan area, could accelerate debt accumulation in South Korea and pose risks to financial stability, threatening a financial system that generally held up well in the face of prolonged political turmoil and US tariffs.】

item.title: 澳大利亚月度 CPI 降温，推高 7 月降息预期
item.description: 澳大利亚 5 月份的月度通胀率降温速度快于预期，接近储备银行 2-3% 目标的底部，这为最快于下月降息提供了更多理由。【原文：A gauge of Australia’s monthly inflation cooled faster than anticipated in May, moving close to the bottom of the Reserve Bank’s 2-3% target and boosting the case for an interest-rate cut as soon as next month.】

item.title: 日本抗议中国在东海的新活动
item.description: 日本外务省周二发表声明称，日本在发现东海有新的建筑活动后向中国提出了申诉。【原文：Japan filed a complaint with China after detecting new construction activities in the East China Sea, according to a statement released by Japan’s foreign ministry on Tuesday.】

item.title: 建屋发展局开始接受本年度印度最大IPO之一的订单
item.description: 建屋发展银行金融服务有限公司（HDB Financial Services Ltd.）开始接受今年印度最大的首次公开募股之一的订单，这笔交易可能会获得1,250亿卢比（15亿美元）的收益，因为这家影子贷款机构希望从最近的股价上涨中获益。【原文：HDB Financial Services Ltd. began taking orders for one of India’s biggest initial public offerings this year, in a deal that may fetch 125 billion rupees ($1.5 billion) as the shadow lender seeks to benefit from the recent rally in stock prices.】

item.title: 日本央行记录显示共同看法：通胀速度快于预期
item.description: 根据日本央行上周政策会议的意见摘要，日本央行董事会成员讨论了通胀率以快于预期的速度运行的问题，同时他们继续认为有必要对与美国关税相关的高度不确定性保持警惕。【原文：Bank of Japan board members discussed inflation running at a faster pace than expected while they continued to see the need for vigilance over high uncertainties related to US tariffs, according to a summary of opinions from their policy meeting last week.】

item.title: 美元波动性下降激发套利交易吸引力
item.description: 据彭博社分析，随着美元波动性相对于其他传统资金来源的下降，卖出美元投资新兴市场货币看起来越来越有吸引力。【原文：Selling the dollar to invest in emerging-market currencies looks increasingly appealing, as greenback volatility drops relative to other traditional funders, according to a Bloomberg analysis.】

item.title: 以色列与伊朗停火减少避险需求，黄金维持跌势
item.description: 由于伊朗和以色列之间不稳定的停火似乎得以维持，减少了避风港需求，中东紧张局势有所缓和，从而引发了黄金的下跌。【原文：Gold held a decline, which was triggered by a reduction in Middle East tensions as a shaky Iran-Israel ceasefire appeared to hold, cutting haven demand.】
